About Me
  • Fan Hey thereğŸ˜Š, I'm Xiaofan Shen. I graduated with a bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Liverpool, and later switched gears to pursue a master's at UCL in Robotics and Computation. I have a deep passion for technology, and I particularly enjoy tinkering with Raspberry Pi to create fun and interesting projects.
    I have two dogs and one cat. I am located in both the UK and China. I love going on self-driving hikes and camping trips with my furry friends. I also have a passion for traveling, exploring the local customs of different countries and regions, and capturing stories through my camera lens.
